When we arrive in there the owner greet us and ask us what food that we want to eat.
Of course we order the grill fish and 2 plate of rice.
While we waiting the food, the weather kinda not compromise with us, it's a rain outside.
The place it's cozy, and the owner is friendly.
The food is delicious, the grill fish smell good and so fresh.
But we find out there's some part in this fish is not grill enough, other than that all so perfect.
We would like to recommended this place if you go to tuktuk.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: San Springwoods
review-text:
Needing a stop to rest before continuing my Samosir adventures, we pulled into this charming little cottage. Forget fancy air conditioning room â€“ this place offers a beachside cabana vibe with unbeatable ocean views, especially during sunset.

The menu has a good range of options, though the prices seem geared more towards hotel guests.  However, their display case has a hoard of pastries and bread , all of them are absolutely delicious. Pair them with the coffee here and you'll have yourself a winner.

Now, the cooked food on the other hand ... let's just say it didn't quite match the stunning scenery or the delightful baked goods. It lacked pretty much everything, even flavor. Maybe their culinary skills are better suited for, well, making Indomie.

Overall, this spot is perfect for a relaxing break, breathtaking views, and indulging in pastries and coffee.  For a gourmet lunch, you might want to explore further, but for a quick bite and a scenic chill, it hits the spot!

name: Binsar 140677
review-text: Untuk jenis makanan dan minuman mgkin sama dengan cafe lainnya tapi untuk suasana dan konsep cafe mungkin sedikit berbeda. View dengan kolam renang hotel dan tepi pantai danau Toba, dgn sunset yg terpamoang depan mata buat hati terasa sejuk.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Anwar Siregar
review-text: Suasana nya asyikkkk

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Ramiro Romero
review-text:
Beautiful restaurant and environment.
The service was super nice with a really good english from the staff, easy to communicate with them.

I just a had a mochaccino and a slice of choc cake, and was way under the level I was expecting from a â€œGerman bakeryâ€, and for the price the charged.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Peter chandra Alam
review-text: Pizzanya recommended sekali. The best in Tuk tuk samosir

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Dennis Sidabutar

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Edwin van Duijn
review-text: Makanannya secara konsisten berkualitas baik selama bertahun-tahun. Area tempat duduknya bersih, pemandangannya indah dan suasananya menyenangkan. Kopi yang enak dan kue yang enak!

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Niena
review-text: Beli passion fruit cake & marble cake. Passion fruitcakenya enak segar wangi markisa gitu, teksturnya lebih lembut daripada marble cakenya. Harus pakai teh biar tidak seret makannya. Harga Rp20.000/slice. Ada chocolate cake, lemon cake dan banana cake juga. Pemandangan cottagenya bagus.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Adi Suryadi

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Yen Ni
review-text: Tempatnya nyaman, tenang dan asri. Sy menyukainya. makanan nya enak. Bisa pesan makanan vegetarian. Pegawai nya ramah.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Meimunah Meimunah
review-text: Recomended hotel

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: johan chandra
review-text: Love the coffee even its kinda expensive but the muffin taste great with their concept of natural.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Pendi Sah

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Linda Pickwick
review-text: Really love this place. The room also very spacious and clean. The owner is so kind also. We stayed for two nights.  Recommend for spending ur vacation here.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: H C
review-text:
Kopi dan teh sangat nikmat.

Kuenya juga enak. Tiramisunya enak.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Zach. D. Yeager
review-text:
Itâ€™s the buffet of Tobo cottage. The address instruction is not clear here. You should go deep inside to enter this restaurant. For people who are not living in this cottage, the breakfast buffet is Rp 95000, which I think itâ€™s quiet expensive.

The reason why I give two stars:

Firstly, the selections of this buffet were not that much. The most unforgivable thing is their milk is made by milk powder. I can instantly taste that. I mean, if you wanna charge this price, at least you should serve me with the real milk.

Secondly, when I was going back to the counter to grap more food. A cat was eating my food on my table. Seriously, your  restaurant has so many staffs but none of you is doing animal control? They recycle your plates very slow as well.

Thirdly, the flys are all over the fruit area which is very disgusting.

Furthermore, their staffs donâ€™t smile.

Good aspects:

A lot of seating areas. The view was good.

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Phang Elis

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Erwin Tjia
review-text: Love it! Staff ramah, ambiance yang baik dan makanannya enak-enak dengan harga yang sangat menarik! Very enjoyable and will definitely come back for the fish and chips. Fresh and delicious!

place-name: Restoran Tabo Toko Roti Dan Sangrai Kopi
name: Anthony Huszar
review-text: Very good coffee. Bakery was good too, although nothing special. Service was very friendly and good setting.

name: Laura Duane
review-text: We really enjoyed our meals here - a massive variety of options on the menu and we loved the Sambal with tofu and pork! We were welcomed into a family home atmosphere and learned that Joeâ€™s restaurant has been open for many, many years. We would recommend!

name: Savanna Bachelder-Arul
review-text: Amazing food and hospitality.

name: Lorine Hills
review-text:
Joe dan Olly menyambut Anda di rumah mereka untuk menikmati berbagai hidangan dengan harga yang menarik.

Mereka mengurus semuanya: sarapan, makan siang, dan makan malam.

Mereka murah hati dan sangat baik... jangan ragu untuk meminta saran perjalanan kepada mereka.

name: AurÃ©lie Le BORGNE
review-text: Seperti keluarga besar, kami disambut di Joe's dengan hangat dan ramah. Makanannya sangat enak karena Oli menyiapkan makan malam untuk kami sesuai permintaan dan rasanya lezat! Saya merekomendasikannya!

name: Morgane Cabfeler
review-text:
Jangan lewatkan! Cobalah, Anda akan menyukainya! Kami makan di sana setiap malam selama kami menginap. Makanannya hampir melampaui keramahan tuan rumah kami.
Saya merekomendasikannya 200%.

name: Diana Goulao
review-text: This place left a place in my heart and maybe thatâ€™s why I went there 4 times in 3 days in Lake Toba! Ooli is absolutely amazing cooking and also a great company. Me and my boyfriend kept coming back every day because of her. Thank you so much for making the best food for us and also chat with us and tell us stories and really make us feel at home. It one day I come back to Samosir Iâ€™ll pass by for sure. Thank you and wishing you the best!

name: Cailin Grant
review-text:
We went to Joe's for brunch and had the chicken a la batak and the pork taco. All homemade, incredible flavour and spices used, and good portions! We enjoyed the meal and atmosphere so much we went back for dinner and had BBQ pork with chips and salad. The pork was cooked perfectly and the homemade sauce was delicious. Our brunch was a good price of 75k for 2 meals, but the bbq pork was our most expensive meal in Indonesia at 240k for 2 people (worth it!). However, the food was also the best we have had so far on our travels! So depending on budget, this place has everything you need and will fill you up!
What we enjoyed most, was Ooli's, Joe's and their granddaughter's company. Thank you for the wonderful stories and making it feel like a homely, family meal.

name: Thibaud Kaya
review-text:
Kami bersenang-senang di restoran ini. Keluarganya menggemaskan dan pemilik restoran sangat membantu.
Kami makan dengan sangat baik, produknya segar dan piringnya terisi dengan baik.
Kami tidak punya waktu untuk kembali tetapi sekali lagi terima kasih kepada JOE dan keluarganya!

Kami sangat merekomendasikan restoran ini.

Thibaud dan Elisa

name: Alexandra Brunner
review-text: Restoran yang dikelola keluarga ini mengesankan dengan hidangan sederhana yang segar dan lezat serta buka sepanjang hari. Kami pergi ke sana untuk sarapan dan makan malam dan makanannya selalu enak dan berlimpah. Kami ingin sekali mencoba barbekyu, yang tersedia berdasarkan reservasi, tetapi sayangnya, waktu kami di Danau Toba berakhir terlalu cepat. Keluarga itu, termasuk cucu perempuan mereka yang menggemaskan, sangat baik dan ramah sehingga kami langsung merasa seperti di rumah dan mengobrol dengan menyenangkan! Pemiliknya juga menawarkan tur keliling pulau. Kami tidak bisa pergi, tetapi mengingat betapa banyak yang bisa dia ceritakan kepada kami tentang pulau dan penduduknya, saya rasa itu sepadan. Kami melewatkan restoran yang nyaman itu malam berikutnya!

name: Bear Bears!
review-text: Joeâ€™s Restaurant is the best meal we had in Samosir Island! The storefront is not large but very cozy. After a rainy night, we received the care of the shop owner here. Grilled pork is really delicious! Taco is cheap and delicious! The shopkeeper has six outstanding children, and her son is pursuing a PhD in Taiwan.

name: Niels Ffrodnalg
review-text: Makan enak di Joe's. Kami adalah kelompok besar yang terdiri dari 14 orang dan semua orang puas. Makanannya juga datang ke semua orang pada saat yang sama, dan ini merupakan hal yang cukup luar biasa di Indonesia.

name: Marasi Manurung
review-text: Mantap

name: Paul
review-text:
Lovely spot for a bite to eat.  Extensive menu featuring Indonesian and Western food.  Indonesian options are probably safest.  Cash only.  Owner speaks good English and has run her restaurant since 1992!  Very personable.

Basic coffees, teas, juices, some sodas, beer, wine and some local liquor available.  Liquor has to be purchased by the bottle.  Lots of soups, variations of fried rice, pancakes, omelettes and other food options.  Comfortable open-air dining on the main coastal road.

name: Filipe Ferreira
review-text: delicious fish curry, fish perfectly cooked. good price too. I want to go back.

name: carol wang
review-text: Lovely family-run restaurant. I stopped by to have breakfast, the owner is very friendly. We had a nice chat. Definitely coming back for grilled fish

name: Emilie Payne
review-text: An extremely lovely family! The food was goodğŸ˜Š Definitely recommend â¤ï¸

name: Mok Shao Yang
review-text:
Food ordered: banana and chocolate pancake, fried egg and toast, local coffee,  and pineapple juice.

Food: portions were large and bananas were sweet, couldn't taste the choc. Coffe and egg toast were standard. Pineapple juice was bad, did not taste fresh.

Service: owners were friendly and talked to us.

Atmosphere: it was early morning, we were alone.

name: Anke Driessen
review-text: Makanan segar yang lezat dan keluarga yang ramah!

name: Stefanie Paetow
review-text:
a truely authentic experience with great food and amazing hospitality! Thank you for making our stay special and sharing your insights on traditions, Lake Toba sights and way of living.
As for the food: We came back another time to indulge the grilled fish, but also options like Tacos and Omlette were just fantastic ğŸ‘ğŸ»

name: BZ Salz
review-text: Nice and relaxing local restaurant, the owners are friendly, humble and helpful. Joe has many interesting stories to share. I ordered the barbecued fish, which is very tasty with the home made chilli. Thank you for the hospitality!

name: Lidia Blandolino
review-text: Good bbq and super nice people! I suggest the bbq fish which is amazing! You should order a day in advance if you can (you can do it on WhatsApp as well, the nimber is on their website!)

name: Kevin Verbeeten
review-text: A 'harus dilakukan' di Samosir, danau toba. Makanan yang sangat enak dan orang -orangnya sangat ramah dan cerewet. Kami sangat merekomendasikan hidangan BBQ!

name: Nolan
review-text: Berbagai pilihan hidangan, harga lebih dari wajar dan pemiliknya sangat ramah! Semuanya buatan sendiri!

name: Julia Prado
review-text: Our favourite place to eat in the island and with a lot vegetarian options.

name: AdriÃ¡n Naval Balado
review-text:
Best place in Samosir.
Uli and Jo are very friendly family.
Thee food is amazing and there are a lot of vegetarian and vegan options, a very long menu with plenty of delicious meals. Ask for the chicken ala batak, delicious!!!!!

name: Riko Fajar
review-text:
Makanannya enak dan Owner-nya ramah.

Service ğŸŒŸ 3 karena lumayan lama bikin makanannya (terus ada beberapa special dishes yang ga bisa diorder karena harus pre order 1 hari sebelumnya).

Tapi walopun masaknya lama, surprisingly rasanya enak. Wajib nyoba lagi kalo balok ke Samosir.

name: Bastian Behrend
review-text: Makanan enak, Joe yang ramah, dan suasana yang tenang!

name: Eva Van Geldorp
review-text: Lovely dinner spot on Samosir island! The wonderful lady cooked us some delicious batak dishes. Very tasty and generous portions!

name: Catherine Fookes
review-text: Amazing vegetarian food! Perfect prices, great portions, and such friendly people! We had such a nice time we went back for our last night on lake toba! Would HIGHLY recommend

name: CÃ©cile Julien
review-text:
Sambutan yang sangat hangat dari Mari Joe dan istrinya. Kami berhenti suatu sore untuk minum. Keramahan tuan rumah membuat kami ingin kembali untuk makan barbekyu... tidak kecewa sama sekali! Ayam dan babi yang diasinkan. Sangat lezat dengan kentang goreng dan ratatouille buatan sendiri, makanan yang sangat mengenyangkan. Kami hanya dapat merekomendasikan!
Terima kasih lagi.

name: Uwe Wohlfarth
review-text: Makanannya sangat lezat dan banyak pilihan.

name: Handika Sidabutar
review-text: Ikan bakarnya jossss

name: Julien Raberin
review-text:
Restoran yang luar biasa, makanannya sangat lezat, dan pemiliknya ramah. Anda akan merasa seperti di rumah sendiri.
Saya merekomendasikan tempat ini tanpa ragu! Terima kasih kepada Joe dan keluarganya.

name: emanuele giunchi
review-text: In my stay in tuk tuk I ate several times at Joe's restourant and I was therefore able to taste many dishes, including Batak cuisine. Batak fish and grilled fish  were delicious and generous portions. The managers are really welcoming, you feel at home and they know English well. if I can, I will definitely come back to eat here!

name: M F
review-text: Sambutan yang luar biasa dan harga yang bagus. Tersedia satu set catur, kami menyukainya!

name: Jordan
review-text: We came here everyday during our stay in tuk tuk. We tried everyday different plate and everything was really good, good quality, good quantity for a descent price. We recommend it!

name: Thomas Nowak
review-text: Makanan yang sangat enak dan murah.

name: Keith McCabe
review-text:
Stumbled across this little gem for lunch today and had the whole place to ourselves â€” such a peaceful, relaxing spot. We ordered freshly cooked Nasi Goreng, Mie Goreng, and a pasta dish, and all three were absolutely delicious with generous portions.

Incredible value too â€” all five of us ate for under â‚¬10. You really canâ€™t beat that for quality and price. Friendly service, great food, and a quiet local vibe. Highly recommended, and weâ€™d definitely come back again!

name: Emilie Lacerda Gomes
review-text: Staf tidak ramah, Anda merasa mengganggu mereka.

name: Tom Jenner
review-text: Amazing food and even better service! We had the chicken steak with veg and fries & it was 10/10. We will be coming back!

name: blub tief
review-text:
Kafe/restoran kecil yang bagus, harga terjangkau dibandingkan dengan restoran lain di Tuk Tuk, porsi besar, sangat lezat, saya terutama merekomendasikan Gado Gado, beberapa hidangan vegan dan vegetarian, tetapi mereka secara otomatis menyediakan kerupuk udang, yang juga dapat Anda pilih untuk tidak memesannya :)
...yang juga sangat saya sukai adalah mereka menyediakan sedotan logam yang dapat dipakai ulang.

name: Ana Jorba
review-text: Disappointed. One hour waiting for this "pork and vegetables tacos". Definetly they don't have enough staff. They didn't even clear the previous diner's plates when they brought us our food. And for an hour and a half, smoked by the cigarettes of the customer behind us.

name: Meine Wenigkeit
review-text: Kafe/restoran terbaik. Makanan rasanya sangat sangat enak dan disiapkan segar. Karyawan juga sangat ramah dan sopan. Suka datang lagi!

name: Sam M
review-text:
Stayed in Tuktuk for 5 days and ate here everyday.
All the food we tried was delicious and freshly prepared.
Was very well priced and the ladies working there were very polite.

name: Josh B.
review-text:
Sangat bagus. Makan di sini beberapa kali sehari selama 4 hari berturut-turut. Kami jatuh cinta dengan toko kecil itu. Semuanya baru disiapkan dan keduanya selalu sangat ramah. Sangat menyenangkan untuk menelusuri menu. Tidak peduli apakah sarapan, makan siang, atau makan malam.
Sebagai seorang vegetarian, saya menemukan sesuatu yang baru setiap hari. Rekomendasi mutlak!!
Saus terong dan tomat tidak hanya untuk saya sekali saja. Burger vegetariannya juga enak!
Jangan membuat kesalahan dengan tidak pergi ke sini!

name: Laura Bayerl
review-text:
Restoran terbaik di seluruh pulau!
Kami berada di sini selama 5 hari dan hampir selalu makan di sini (sarapan dan makan malam). Kami membuat kesalahan dengan makan di tempat lain dua kali. Kafe hari ini adalah yang terenak dan terlezat. Pemilik kafe sangat baik dan akomodatif, setiap permintaan makanan khusus dipenuhi. Semuanya benar-benar terasa luar biasa dan sangat segar. Tip: semua hidangan dengan saus tomat (yang baru dimasak) sangat enak!
Jadikan Todays CafÃ© sebagai pilihan berbelanja Anda di pulau ini, Anda tidak akan menyesalinya. Kami akan sangat merindukannya di sini.

name: Jan Niklas Schneider
review-text:
Toko terbesar di pulau yang indah ini.
Anda dapat memesan apa saja dan semuanya terasa enak dan sangat segar. Pasti mencoba salad alpukat.
Anda dapat menemukan sesuatu yang cocok di menu kapan saja sepanjang hari.
Kami pernah melakukan kesalahan dengan makan di tempat lain.

name: ED Steve
review-text: Western and local food. One of the top 3 restaurants in Tuktuk.

name: L. Remijn
review-text:
Tepian sayuran yang lezatg!
Sarapan yang luar biasa!

name: Pete Muskens
review-text: After 4 nights in Tuktuk Iâ€™m sorry to say that we only had our first meal here on our last night. The staff were friendly and the Indonesian food was great. Highly recommended are the Grilled fish with the andaliman (pepper) sauce and the rendang.

name: Jere Mia
review-text: Makanannya sangat lezat, layanannya sangat ramah dan penuh perhatian. Suasana di restoran nyaman dan mengundang. Saya pasti akan kembali!"

name: Anggina Harianja
review-text: Rekomend bangatğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ â€¦

name: Amsari Rumahorbo
review-text: Restorann yang bagus, pilihan makan yang Bervariasi,

name: Ricardo Lucassen
review-text: Restoran yang bagus, tapi jangan berharap kuliner yang nikmat. Rendang dagingnya kurang enak, dagingnya terlalu kering, dan rendangnya terlalu asin. Kentang goreng yang kami pesan sebagai lauk sangat lezat!

name: Chris Boek
review-text: Nice restaurant and friendly service. Had the gado gado and mie goreng. Both good but the gado gado had maybe too much satÃ© sauce.

name: Jane Baron
review-text: Delicious food so we ate here 3 times.  All cooked from scratch.  Lovely ladies, very helpful and great cooks.

name: Lieke
review-text: Makanan terbaik di kota wow wow wow!!

name: CÃ©line Velter
review-text:
Kami sarapan di sana!
Porsinya murah hati.
Umumnya kami tergoda oleh roti panggang alpukat gandum dan telur goreng sebagai pendampingnya.
Jangan ragu untuk mencoba kue kelapa. Ini sangat mengejutkan dan bagus. Menurutku lebih mendekati adonan kue goreng (20k untuk 4 kue besar)

name: Mark Soames
review-text: Great place to enjoy breakfast. Lots of choice, delicious food and friendly service. We had breakfast here on three mornings and would definitely recommend.

name: Iris Van Rooij
review-text: Really good food!!

name: Peter Harmsen
review-text: The food is very much different from what you get in other of the usual warungs/restaurants. I had an avocado with genuine espresso in the morning. For dinner I had an extrordinary tasty pepper chicken steak with fries. Make sure to come early as it can be full.

name: AGNES CZEKANSKA
review-text: What a Gem! We keep going back. Such a variety with many veg meals. Fresh juices, great breakfast selection including yogurt and musli, good coffee and all served with a smile. Freshly cooked and well priced.

name: Philippe Ratier
review-text:
Kami pergi ke sana beberapa hari setelah pergi ke restoran pizza di seberang jalan.
Restoran itu direkomendasikan oleh seorang wanita Prancis yang tinggal di antara Indonesia dan Malaysia, namanya Joe.
Makanan disiapkan setelah Anda memesan. Memang butuh sedikit waktu, tetapi rasanya sungguh luar biasa. Harganya terjangkau, sedikit lebih mahal daripada di daratan atau di luar Tuc Tuc... tapi itulah yang diinginkan kota ini... tempat ini seperti jebakan turis. Sayang sekali restorannya hampir kosong.
Bagaimanapun, ini adalah festival rasa, mungkin agak terlalu pedas.
Saya merekomendasikannya.

name: Vladimir Khokhlov
review-text: Nikmati hidangan di tempat yang luar biasa ini. Yogurt markisa buatan sendiri, jus sirsak, steak dengan saus lada, dan sayuran al dente yang lezat. Semua ini dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau. Saya merekomendasikannya dan akan kembali lagi dan lagi.

name: Tobias Neutz
review-text: Very very tasty food. I had a nice salad and a chicken steak with vegetables.

name: Constance Ng
review-text: Suka dengan makanan yang disajikan di sini.  Kami pesan gado-gado, saksang, ikan nila bakar sambal andaliman, sapi lada hitam, ayam lada hitam, ayam goreng, kari ayam, sate ayam, pancake pisang, dan yoghurt buah muesli. Menu yang paling kami sukai adalah saksang, ikan nila sambal andaliman, dan gado - gado. Sambal andalimannya enak banget. Waktu tunggu sekitar 45 menit karena kami pesan lumayan banyak. Pemilik cafe juga sangat ramah.

name: Jeanne A.
review-text: Restoran ini adalah permata di pulau itu, kami pergi ke sana hampir setiap hari. Kami telah mencoba banyak hidangan dan semuanya enak! Favorit: burger vegetarian yang luar biasa dan dengan kentang goreng buatan sendiri! Para wanitanya menggemaskan dan detail kecil seperti sedotan baja tahan karat juga membuat perbedaan.

name: Antonio Molina
review-text: Tempat makan favorit kami di pulau ini, makanannya enak, gadis-gadisnya cantik! Banyak pilihan vegetarian dan vegan

name: Harmony TrouvÃ©
review-text: Makanan dibuat sesuai pesanan dengan produk segar. Hidangannya jauh lebih rumit dan lezat dibandingkan apa yang Anda temukan di sebagian besar restoran di Sumatera. Bravo kepada para wanita yang mengelola restoran ini, yang terbaik sejauh ini bagi kami setelah dua minggu perjalanan.

name: Ariel Katseer
review-text: Very vegan friendly and super tasty.

name: Emily Suhre
review-text: Nice little restaurant, super friendly staff and delicious foods!

name: nick w
review-text:
Kami memesan roti bawang putih sebagai starter. Ini tiba dengan cukup gosong dan rasanya juga seperti itu.
Setelah itu kami makan steak ayam yang cukup pedas dan mungkin lebih mirip steak lada.
Karinya enak.

Keesokan paginya kami merasa sedikit aneh.

name: Siew Chuen Lim
review-text:
Kami adalah pelanggan pertama dan menunggu makanan kami selama hampir 40 menit.
Makanannya rasanya enak.

name: Cynthia Van Amerongen
review-text: Best food we had so far! We would definetely recommend eating here.

name: Lau Rine
review-text: Roti panggang alpukat yang sangat enak, guacamole, dan terong dengan tomat sangat enak. Makan sayur itu baik bagi kami. Stafnya ramah. Saya merekomendasikan

name: Luc Spoelders
review-text:
Look no further, this restaurant is one of the best in Tuktuk. I have tried a few but after the first time here I kept coming back; 3 days of lunch and dinner, both Western and Indonesian and everything was always super tasty. And always with a very sweet, friendly service!
Keep up the good work team Today's Cafe!

name: Ross Boaden
review-text: Just so good, ended up here several times. Breakfast, lunch and dinner meals were all of the highest quality, and very well priced.

name: Adriana R
review-text:
Saya sangat senang kami memilih untuk makan di tempat ini!
Kemudian kami kembali lagi pada 2 malam berikutnya, sayangnya kami akan berangkat besok tetapi Anda yang membaca ulasan ini dapat memanfaatkan makanan lezat dengan harga yang wajar, dimasak oleh beberapa gadis luar biasa!
Porsinya juga sangat murah hati.
Saya merekomendasikan Ikan Arsik Paskah, Sak Sang, ikan dengan saus andaliman, mie Gomak, chapati guacamole ... dll
Terima kasih!

name: elena
review-text: Saya berbagi pendapat, makanannya enak dan pelayanannya sangat baik. Kami makan siang/makan malam setelah seharian naik sepeda motor. Pukul 16.30, sangat lelah, kami sampai dan bisa makan enak. Kari ikan, redang daging sapi, dan salad alpukat, dengan dua Americano yang sangat enak, sangat direkomendasikan. Saya akan kembali untuk mencoba hidangan daging babi dan sayuran mereka.

name: Sergio Musali
review-text:
Babi Milanese dengan kentang sangat lezat. Chapati dengan guacamole sangat lezat!
Terima kasih

name: Sisi
review-text: Good small eatery with friendly service, good food, generous portion and reasonable price.  Loving their pot of hot ginger tea, such a steal, will go back to try their other menus.

name: JOF Tan
review-text: a cosy cafe run by 3 sisters. serves breakfast, lunch n dinner. western n indonesian cuisine. good tasty food at reasonable prices. the passion fruit yogurt is a delicious n refreshing start to your day. enjoy.

name: Mumu Thibz
review-text: Lovely place, nice people and tasty food. Thank you!

name: Iris
review-text: Teh jahe yang lezat

name: Oliver
review-text:
Nyonya rumah yang sangat sayang.
Menu besar dengan masakan Barat dan Indonesia. Semuanya baru disiapkan dan oleh karena itu memerlukan waktu. Tapi itu pasti sepadan. Rasanya sangat enak dan porsinya adalah yang terbesar yang pernah kami temukan di Indonesia!

name: Wilson Yap
review-text:
I had the steak with fries and veg. The sauce is so good. Next time shld just go for medium rare.
Sister is also very friendly and attentive.
Paid 75k for my fantastic meal. Would be here regularly if I stayed in tuktuk.

name: Jacob Wood
review-text:
A casual place to eat with insanely big portions. The banana pancake was so unique and way too big for one person, I persisted and fell into a sugar coma.

We were back the next day to try the potato randang and sweet and sour vegetables. The randang was the closest Iâ€™ve found to traditional randang so far in my trip, with lemongrass and whole spices throughout the thick pasty sauce, while it didnâ€™t go super well with potatoes it did make for a nice vegetarian option. Iâ€™m sure the beef would be fantastic.

The sweet and sour vegetables were your typical pineapple juice and ketchup sweet and sour (not a bad thing, but itâ€™s nothing special). Nice chunks of pineapple and fresh vegetables made it a great sweet dish to balance out the spice and intensity of the randang.

The two dishes which were incredibly cheap split between the two of us with a pot of tea and white rice filled us up so much we almost couldnâ€™t finish it. I cannot express enough how large the portions are. Itâ€™s great.

Service is slow, even when quiet, but thatâ€™s fine by me as the food is so fresh and there is only 1 or 2 people working at a time (both cooking and serving). Bring your computer and get some work done on the free Wi-Fi (code is on the front page of the menu) or chill out on the lounge chairs on the balcony. We stayed for hours working on our laptops.

The staff are lovely and very accomodating, youâ€™ll feel comfortable here as a foreigner, even if youâ€™re a solo traveler. Itâ€™s usually quite quiet.

I donâ€™t have much experience with drinks here but the hot tea Iâ€™ve ordered has come with the sugar seperate which is great to get it to the sweetness level of your liking.

To the owners, you have a gem here, keep it the way it is, itâ€™s a fantastic place to eat.

name: Luisa Kunz
review-text: Spent a few days in Tuk Tuk and everytime we walked past this place, it was fairly occupied (in contrast to all the empty places around). When we finally decided to have dinner there ourselves, we were amazed by the amazing food. We had pork steak and the local specialty, Sak Sang, which is amazing - you should try it!

name: Zuzana Cernikovska
review-text: Went here for breakfast and dinner and the food was delicious, generous portion and in a really lovely settings. Prices are very reasonable. Definitely go check it out!

name: Caro Psm
review-text:
Kafe saat ini menjadi kantin kami selama beberapa hari di Tuk Tuk. Makanannya enak dan berlimpah, kedua manajernya menggemaskan dan tersedia! Suasananya tenang dan menyenangkan!
Kami menyukai semuanya :)

name: Emma Hofman
review-text:
Makanan super enak! Porsi yang mengenyangkan.
Kami memiliki taco ayam dan sayur serta quesadilo? dan untuk hidangan penutup, taco pisang

name: Eugene Tania
review-text: The food may take a while to prepare, but overall the food is good! You definitely have to order Roschti (some kind of potato pancake) because it's just so good!

name: Mette Madsen
review-text: Delicious food and nice staff.  =)  great coffee

name: laura zuijderduijn
review-text:
Kami pergi beberapa hari berturut-turut karena itu sangat enak!
Rendang daging sapi, rendang ayam, burger ayam, sate, smoothies semuanya enak banget!!

name: Lord Charles
review-text: Every thing cooked from scratch, can't say enough good things about this place

name: Rhys Hulme
review-text: Food takes a while. But itâ€™s because they make it so good ! Delicious

name: Alexa Worswick
review-text: Amazing warung! Don't miss it while staying in Tuk Tuk. I ate here almost 5 times - mostly local food and the flavours were AMAZING! Best vegetable rendang I have ever tried in several years in Indonesia. Very fresh flavours and ingredients. Avo toast was also great and all portions are huge.

name: Hendrik de Vries
review-text:
Nice local place to have dinner, very extensive menu list with local and western options. Friendly staff.
Peanut sauce too chunky and to much lemongrass for my taste.

name: Adrien Jouvinier
review-text:
Restoran yang sangat bagus. Masakan rumahan. Kami makan di sana tiga malam berturut-turut, dengan beragam hidangan: "Ikan Ala Batak", "Ikan Asam Manis", "Rendang Sayur Tahu", "Rendang Daging Sapi", dan "Terong Saus Tomat". Anda harus memesan "Ikan Ala Batak" terlebih dahulu, yang merupakan ikan terenak yang pernah saya cicipi; rasa dan bumbunya sungguh luar biasa.
Mereka menawarkan kelas memasak, yang belum kami coba, tetapi mungkin menarik.
Kami disambut dengan sangat hangat dan senyuman.

name: Mariska Vos
review-text: Lovely place, lovely food, lovely people. Took a cooking lesson, which was very nice as well!

name: Mackenzie Smith
review-text: My favorite place in tuk tuk! Nice people and fresh ingredients

name: G Journey
review-text:
Daging sapi 60k lumayan juga. Akan lebih baik lagi kalau kopinya digiling segar, lagi pula namanya Kopi Masa Kini.
Pelayanan bagus, wifi

name: Brendon Peter Lim
review-text:
Tried their fried noodles and the taste was acceptable.
It was empty when I went there for dinner.

name: Karolina Krzywicka
review-text: Fantastic food and funtastic stuff. A must visit in Tuk Tuk. My favourite place in Sumatra

name: Jacek Zaborowski
review-text: The best restsurant in Sumatra we have been to. Everything is fresh made from scratch for you so you need to warto. Worth every minute and every penny.

name: Jessica M.
review-text: Sarapan yang lezat

name: Lisa van Berkel
review-text: Great food, there is a range of western and Indonesian food. We tried both and both were excellent!

name: Stan Heemskerk
review-text: Makanan lezat dengan harga bagus!

name: Daniel Rathmann
review-text: The food is cooked to perfection ğŸ˜Š we went there 3 times and everything we ate was so tasty!

name: David
review-text: Kami makan di sini setiap malam selama menginap. Makanannya memang agak lama disiapkan, tapi sepadan dengan waktu tunggunya! Itu salah satu makanan terbaik yang kami coba selama perjalanan ke Sumatra. Kami sangat merekomendasikan rendang vegetarian dan gado-gadonya.

name: Simon StadtmÃ¼ller
review-text:
Kafe itu sangat nyaman.
Pisang goreng saus coklat dan donat pisangnya enak banget. Porsinya juga layak untuk harganya.
Sangat direkomendasikan.

name: Morgane Seite
review-text: Tempat terbaik, semua hidangan yang kami santap di sana sangat lezat dan pemiliknya juga sangat baik. Ini adalah tempat di mana saya menyantap burger vegetarian terenak dalam hidup saya, sangat besar! Mengenai hidangan lokal, sangat lezat, setiap saat. Terima kasih!

name: L G
review-text: Best in the area. Good food, good service, confortable and fair prices for the area. Perfect.

name: BHS Sk
review-text: We went there following some good reviews of the place and we were not at all disappointed. The wait may be a bit long but the food is worth the wait. We went there 3 evening on the row and had the opportunity to taste a variety of meals. All was fresh, good and cheap. Highly recommended ğŸ«¶ğŸ¼

name: JJ
review-text: Restoran yang bagus dengan makanan yang benar-benar lezat. Wanita-wanita di sana sangat baik. Sangat direkomendasikan!

name: germina habib
review-text:
Luar biasa
Jika Anda ingin makanan Indonesia, di sinilah tempatnya! Enak sekali!

name: Aad de Graaf
review-text: Nice food - good service

name: Nienke Wellen
review-text: Rendang vegetarian dan pisang gorengnya sangat lezat. Anda harus menunggu beberapa saat untuk makanan Anda karena semuanya baru disiapkan.

name: Marianne Senn
review-text: The meals are fantastic and the owner - a local lady - cooks by herself. She has an excellent and wide range of about 100 - 120 meals, international, indonesian and a lot of vegetarian meals. Reasonable prices and good portions.

name: Tonja en Maurice Engelen
review-text: Pelayanan yang ramah. Makanan enak. Semuanya baru disiapkan, tapi menunggu lama. Sedikit terlalu pedas bagi kami. Sangat direkomendasikan.

name: Tom Hardiman
review-text:
Great cafe with extensive menu and generous portions at reasonable prices!

The main issue is that food takes a very long time to arrive (and will not arrive together) so recommend getting there early to endure you get a table and don't wait and 1.5h plus for food!

name: Olaf Molenveld
review-text: Good food, nice atmosphere. Service can take a little while sometimes, but the wait is worth it. Can recommend the gado-gado!

name: Puck van de Ven
review-text: Food is amazing!!!!!!!

name: Mar Moratalla
review-text:
Makanannya sangat enak di kedua hari kami bisa makan dan stafnya sangat baik.
Saya merekomendasikan gado gado, ubi, dan kari!

name: Mark Dikker
review-text: Great food, nice staff and pleasant seating.

name: Edith van den Bosch
review-text: Makanannya lezat dan segar, saya sangat menikmatinya (saya pesan gado-gado dan kari sayur kelapa). Jusnya juga enak. Stafnya ramah. Sangat direkomendasikan!

name: Reinier
review-text: Tempat yang fantastis dengan staf yang ramah dan makanan lezat!

name: Eva Holtland
review-text: Great place, delicious food and kind staff. Also good western food!

name: Jessica Mennel
review-text: DELICIOUS!

name: Cedric Tang
review-text:
This restaurant is amazing. All the food are homemade, and delicious.
You should try also the cooking class, its very intersting to see how to make a indonesian food.

name: Morgane Morgane
review-text: Amzing restaurant in tuktuk. We had a great time : good and fresh food. The girls who cooks are super smily and nice. Hightly recommand this restaurant

name: Peri Juliette
review-text: Markas kami selama ini tinggal di Tuktuk. Staf super ramah, penuh perhatian, penuh perhatian yang berbicara bahasa Inggris dengan baik. Makanannya luar biasa, 100% buatan sendiri dan terlihat jelas. Baik untuk makanan Indonesia maupun Barat. Semua hidangan yang diuji telah divalidasi. Terima kasih banyak, kami akan melewatkannya!

name: Ri Cardo
review-text: Gado-gadonya enak banget

name: Harry Gunn
review-text: Delicious food and Yummy vegetarian options! Would recommend

name: Lulublond
review-text: We come here every morning for breakfast and we did just today our cooking class, the food is amazing and we highly recommend it!

name: Ferina (Ryn)
review-text: Food are tasty and fresh. It took some time to prepare our food but it's okay and I think it's huge portion, price is fair and friendly staff.

name: Ploteus
review-text: Restoran yang bagus dan menyenangkan, menu besar, makanan yang sangat enak.

name: Dong Kuk Ryu
review-text: One of the best places to visit in samosir

name: Tumpal Herry H
review-text:
Pilihan makanan bervariasi dan porsi terbilang cukup besar. Secara umum makanan enak dan waktu pelayanan cukup baik karena kita group 6 orang dengan banyak pesanan tapi tidak terasa menunggu terlalu lama.
Rekomendasi untuk tempat sarapan bagi yang jalan-jalan pagi keliling Tuk-tuk.

name: al purba
review-text: Tempatnya nyaman, ada masakan indonesia dan western

name: Debbie Parkin
review-text:
Was recommendedthis place by the guy from England who lives next door to citra supermarket.
Ordered a mixed salad which was fabulous and a good portion too. Then had chicken coconut curry and rice which was delicious.
Would definitely recommend this place. Great selection of dishes, great value, lovel clean place.
And the staff??
I'd injured my knee, it had started to rain so the owner insisted on dropping me off on her scooter.
You can't get better than that!!!!!!!!

name: Chiara Lia
review-text: Nice place for brekkie, food was good. WiFi working well

name: mark R
review-text: Good food and service, nice prices

name: Fiona HauÃŸelt
review-text: Great Gado-Gado! Big portion, we hardly finished it, but it was too good not to ğŸ¤­ â€¦

name: Anthony Huszar
review-text: Very good shake and yoghurt.

name: Gur Kenobi
review-text:
Makanan yang sangat lezat! Ada lebih dari sekadar nasi dan mie goreng untuk para vegetarian. Hidangan yang kreatif.
Coba burger vegetarian!

name: Graeme Middleton
review-text: Great food.. loverly Staff

name: Jean Aubusson
review-text: The owner is lovely, and food is great ! Thank you

name: Katti GrÃ¼gi
review-text: Setelah sarapan yang lezat, kami memesan pelajaran memasak untuk malam itu! Itu sungguh hebat!

name: Jojo Klaagzak
review-text: Food was bad and didn't arrive at the same time.

name: Novi Anky
review-text:
Juice sirsak,dan alpukatnya tanpa tambahan gula,juga ikan goreng dan sambel andalimannya.
Bisa bikin ingat terus..ga bakal nyesel harganya juga ga mahal sesuai kocek

name: Gandhi Syahputra
review-text: ownernya kasih pencerahan buat karyawan yg laki laki yg kurus,kalau kerja itu tulus jangan prengat prengut,ngantar makanan atau minunan juga jangan muka ketus.

name: Jenny official
review-text: Lama banget datang nya , udah 40menit duduk satupun makan dan minum pun gak ada yang datang , tanya pelayanya , tapi pelayannya selalu bilang bentar " dengan muka jutek

name: Dentista
review-text: Perjuangan makan ke sini harus siap melewati jalan sempit dan terjal yang muat untuk 1 mobil. Kalau papasan salah satu harus mundur cari yang agak lapang karena minggir sedikit mepet jurang. Herannya banyak yang penasaran ke sini mungkin gara-gara tiktok. Makanan rasanya tidak istimewa tapi view nya yang bagus, danau Toba yang jernih sampai ikan mas kelihatan. Ada anak-anak juga yang berenang tebutan koin.

name: nande TiGAN
review-text: Tutup aja cafe nya... ngk betul pelayanan nya...

name: Adi
review-text:
Datang, duduk, manggil mbak pelayannya, disuruh tunggu. 10 menit berlalu, akhirnya inisiatif ke kasir utk order, disuruh tunggu di meja. 20 menit berlalu, ga ada juga yg datang. Akhirnya pulang tanpa makan atau minum.
Padahal datang kesana jam 3 sore dan ga ramai.
Pelayan cuma 2, wanita. Kelihatan capek banget.
Udah bela2in lewat jalan yg jelek, turunan curam, dan sempit. Ternyata pas sampai, pelayanannya begitu.

name: El Huta
review-text: Enak sih tp kalo pake mobil jalurnya curam dan pas satu mobil, kebetulan gak ada mobil lain, lbh baik nyebrang pake perahu

name: Heru Kristanto
review-text: Resto (tempat makan) yg lokasinya persis di pinggir Danau Toba. View-nya bagus dengan pandangan yg luas. Mobil bisa masuk ke lokasi. Menu makan rata2 seafood, rasanya lumayan enak.

name: Yosepin Sirait
review-text: Makanan nya sama pelayanan 100000000/10

name: Sonya Manik
review-text:
pesan Kopi Susu Dingin, datanglah kopi susu dgn memakai gelas wine ğŸ˜‚.
ku sedot lah...astaga ..tak terbilang.
gelas wine itu kan kecil ya..Kopi + SKM + Es batu.. sudah ku aduk tp hanya SKM nya yg terasa.. kopi nya entahlah...25 rb pulak .. dan itu kopi hitam bubuk ya..bukan dari bean mesin coffee. jd aku kayak minum SUSU KENTAL MANIS dingin ..

Temanku pesan kelapa muda 25 rb ğŸ˜‚.
atmosphere enak pas tepi danau..
toilet Jorok..apalah kebersihan yg diharap di sumut ini? maklum aja lah.
cukup pertama dan terakhir .

name: Andi Lubis
review-text: Sangat memuaskan makanannya enak enak dan cocok bawa keluarga

name: Hontoni Baka
review-text: Sangat disayangkan, untuk kelokasi saja sudah ekstrim, sampai dilokasi sangat disayangkan, untuk harga yg sangat wow, dengan rasa makanan yg tebilang dibawah standart, maaf seperti baru belajar masak, dan jga terutama pelayanan yang sangat buruk, dan jga jutek, mohon diperbaiki lagi, sangat tidak layak dengan view yg kek gitu, gak cocok.

name: Edbert Pangestu
review-text:
Tempat makan terfavorit di LAKE TOBA. Tempat bagus, view bagus, makanan enak, harga terjangkau, alias MURAH.

IKAN NILA ARSIK super recommended ya :)

Sampai ludes di foto

name: arief munandar
review-text:
Hidden Gem!
Untuk ketempat ini perlu pengorbanan karna jalan menuju ke restorannya menurun dan hanya muat 1 mobil.

Tapi terbayarkan ketika sampai, dengan View pas sejajar dengan Danau toba.

Makanan nya enak, View nya sangaat bagus & pelayanannya juga Oke.

Top Recommended

name: Nova vivi Yanti riska
review-text:
Uda lama langganan di smahal gpp lah
tapi kemaren kecewa kali , pelayan nya sok , sombong tidak beretika , makanan nya gak enak , ikan panggang nya dingin , minta tambahan makanan sama sendok kayak ngemis
Kapok gak lagi lah ke sini

name: Chairul Hasibuan
review-text: pelayanan lambat, rasa makanan biasa saja,tapi mahal pelayanannya sangat amat buruk,saat dipanggil bukannya datang malah buang muka tidak senang jalanannya sangat kecil,sangat ekstrem

name: Bundanya Azzam
review-text:
Pelayanannya yang sangat buruk,tidak recomended makanannya kurang enak tapi harga nya mahal,karyawatinya sangat sombong,angkuh,dan saat ditegor bukannya salah malah menggerutu,jalanannya sangat ekstrim,curam,sempit
SARAN SAYA LEBIH BAIK JANGAN DATANG

name: Bodhaswara Setiawan
review-text:
Makanannya enak-enak.. harga lumayan agak mahal tapi masih worth it untuk dapat suasana dan kesegaran manakanannya.

Pelayanannya agak sedikit lama, padahal saat Kami datang dipertengahan Oktober 2024 itu suasananya sedang tidak begitu ramai.

Pemandangan dan suasana alam ditempat makannya luar biasa indah dan bersih.

name: honk media
review-text: Makanan enak dan destinasi makan lobster murah

name: Edy Susanto
review-text:
Jalanan turun yang terjal sebanding dengan lokasi makan di pinggir danau toba yang sangat nyaman.

Makanan juga khas.

Silahkan mampir dan coba.. ğŸ‘

name: William Colins
review-text:
Tempat nya bagus sekali pemandangan nya.
Kebersihan alat makan sangat kurang.
Pesan ikan nila goreng terasa bau tanah dan kurang rasa. Pesan ayam goreng terlalu rasa tepung dan tidak terasa bumbu. Tumis kangkung standar tapi masih ada rasa.

name: Fonouvdior
review-text: Tempat makan seafood dengan pemandangan danau Toba. Naik ferry Dari parapat atau samosir untuk bisa ke sini.

name: ji jo
review-text: Pisang gorengnya masih mengkal dan asem. Harga makanannya  lumayan but untuk cita rasa B aja benar2 gak sesuai ekspektasi.. bisa di tingkatkan lagi untuk cita rasanya...

name: hernando tantowi
review-text: Tempat makan lokasi bagus, namun dirusak oleh service Dan kualitas makanannya yg jelek, Dari karyawan tidak ramah mau pesan disuruh ke kasih sudah dikasir disuruh ke meja pesan setelah itu untuk peralatan makan Dan piring saja seperti tidak dicuci piring dikasih Masih basah", karyawan disuruh tambah menu tidak dicatat diulang" sampai harus kami ke dapurnya untuk sampaikan pesanannya, untuk makanan porsi kecil sekali cumi goreng kecil Dan keras, sayur tidak berasa, ikan Masih mentah sudah disajikan. Tidak akan kembali lagi Dan disarankan tidak ush ke sini.

name: Fenny Valentine
review-text: ikan g mateng

name: Kevin Zhuo (kepinn)
review-text:
Lebih baik gunakan perahu untuk makan di sini, jangan menggunakan mobil.
Jalan sangat sempit.

name: novi Lasma
review-text: Makan malam disini, sebetulnya suasananya nyaman, namun rasa makanannya biasa sekali, tidak authentic. Saya berharap makan masakan yg khas bumbunya, ternyata tidak seperti saya harapkan.

name: Febrina Naibaho
review-text:
kemarin kesini dtg berdua naik motor, tapi kurang dilayani pdhl kami dtg duluan dari yg udah dilayani. walaupun kami dtg bukan naik mobil kan kesininya dtg untuk mesan makan bukan utk foto2 doangğŸ˜­
tapi makanannya enak2 jus jeruknya manteup asliiiğŸ«¶ğŸ»

name: information information
review-text: Tempatnya setelah renovasi sangatlah bagus dan nyaman. Semua makanannya enak, stafnya ramah dan harganya juga cukup terjangkau.

name: Luis Sumbayak
review-text: View keren

name: Naomi M
review-text: Overhyped restaurant that takes forever to serve orders. The menu are so so with small portions. The Crawfish on the menu is mistaken for baby lobsters.

name: Patia Marbun
review-text: Singkat saja, restoran ini pelayanannya sangat buruk. Padahal pelayanan itu salah satu hal terpenting buat restoran. Gimana pengunjung mau balik lagi kalo pelayanannya ga bagus. Para pelayan sama sekali tidak responsif. Sangat disayangkan padahal rasa makanannya tidak buruk. Kapok datang ke sini, cari restoran yang lain aja. Semoga ownernya bisa berbenah.

name: Yuri Manalu
review-text:
Sangat menjijikkan ! Piring masih basah sudah diberikan kepada tamu.  Dan lucunya ketika makan  sudah diingatkan untuk memberikan sendok namun sampai hidangan sudah selesai dimakan ,sendok tak kunjung datang.
Bahkan ada kucing dan ada anjing berkeliaran
Dan kucing pun dibiarkan keliaran diatas meja makan. Sungguh pelayanan terburuk selama saya berwisata dipulau samosir dan sekitarnya. Saya harap tidak ada lagi wisatawan yang dikecewakan..
dan semoga bos owner dari pada resto ini mendengar komplain dari para netizen.
Oia satu lagi harga makanan disini sangat mahal
7 orang makan saja harganya sampai 1 juta
Padahal menu yg kami pesan hanya cumi goreng, ayam goreng damasus, capcay dan minuman.
No Turning back !

name: Erichson Basten
review-text:
Pelayanan yang buruk ! Cukup sekali kesini dan ga akan kesini lagi bahkan karyawati yang bekerja tidak ramah! Zero hospitality!
Pantas saja wisatawan tidak mau ke tanah batak
Kalau karyawatinya saja tidak ramah dalam menyambut tamu restaurant dan memberikan yang seharusnya diberikan.
Saya memesan makan di resto ini
Namun nasinya tidak diberikan..
Dan datang setelah 30 menit.
Bahkan yang paling parah sendok makan tidak disediakan padahal sudah diingatkanâ€¦ dan sendok pun sampai makanan habis tidak diberikanâ€¦ akhirnya saya dan seluruh keluarga makan dengan tangan sajaâ€¦
Mirisss.. karyawati yang tidak ber tata krama dengan baik.
Ketika ditegur pun malah menggrutuâ€¦
Semoga tidak ada lagi korban khususnya wisatawan yg ksini..

name: Loam Nainggolan
review-text: Tidak Rekomen! resto ini pelayanannya buruk! jangan pernah kesini. pesan makanan lauknya diantar nasinya tak kunjung datang. bahkan sendok untuk makan tidak disediakan. bahkan karyawatinya menggerutu ketika dikomplain. jangan buang buang waktu untuk makan disini. nasi tidak hangat. lauk pauk juga sudah dingin.

name: Nancy Bangun
review-text:
Perjalanan ke resto ini sangat beresiko, jalan hanya bisa dilewati satu mobil dengan salah satu sisi adalah jurang.

Makanan dan pelayanan juga sangat buruk. Saya memesan udang saus tiram, yang datang adalah udang kecap dan dengan harga 85ribu udang yang datang hanya udang kecil sejumlah 6 ekor saja. Ikan nila bakar yang saya pesan juga tidak datang sampai saya selesai makan. Nasi putih yang saya order juga datang setelah 45 menit.

name: Siska Lewy
review-text: Tempat makan dgn pemandangan dan suasana yg sgt bagus

name: 20-021_Amir Harahap
review-text: pelayanannya sangat buruk , nanya menu aja dijutekin, asam manisnya ga ada rasa asamnya untuk tempat enakkkk

name: Lydia Arsyah
review-text: pelayanan nya sangat amat kurang baik,kurang ramah,kurang cepat,pelayanaann lama

name: ELVIS Ginting

review-text:
THE FIRST AND THE LAST WE'VE EVER COME HERE.
Alasan kita makan disini karena dekat dengan Hotel Patra dan
setelah kita observasi ternyata karyawan sangat sedikit ketika crowded saat lunch.
Order KELAPA FRESH UTUH yang datang KELAPA JOROK DENGAN ULAT. Kita komplain secara privasi dengan maksud agar tidak terdengar dengan konsumen lain, namun sikap mereka sangat songong seakan tidak terima jika terdapat komplain pada makanan yg mereka sediakan.
sangat sangat menahan emosi saat makan disitu, ketika mereka membersihkan meja, mereka bernyanyi seakan ngedumel dan sembari bergumam berkata yg tidak pantas. sering kali terdengar ucapan "cuci meja dan kursi" "cuci danau toba" dan ngedumel lainnya dengan ontonasi yang cukup terdengar keras seakan orang yg tidak ikhlas bekerja.
JANGAN BERHARAP UCAPAN TERIMAKASIH DARI MEREKA, KATA MAAF SAJA TIDAK MAMPU MEREKA UTARAKAN UNTUK KINERJA DAN PELAYANAN YANG TIDAK PANTAS ITU.
100% BAD ATTITITUDE
Apakah ini resto keluarga? pelayannya adalah anggota keluarga juga? saya rasa jika ini resto keluarga mereka tidak akan melakukan hal yang menciptakan citra buruk brand mereka.
KETAHUILAH RESTO INI CUKUP BAGUS NAMUN MAKANAN DAN PELAYANANNYA SANGAT TIDAK MASUK KATEGORI BAIK.

name: Dharma M
review-text: Very nice restaurant with a view. It is located by Toba Lake.  We came here by boa after short visitvto Samosir Island. You can reach this place by car but with a boat is another experience. We came here as part of the tour. The scenery was beautiful. You eat with the view of the lake. The food was ready when we arrived. Overall, the food is standard. They use local fish from the lake, I believe.  The service was very good. It was a good experience. There are local kids waiting forcyou to throw coin to the lake so yhey can dive to find it. There are also many fishes waiting for you to throw leftover food to the lake. You can also ee egrets. Will come again next time.

review-text: Tempat ini patut disebut sebagai hidden gem. Berkali-kali ke Prapat, baru kali ini saya tahu dari teman tentang tempat ini. Lokasinya dekat dengan hotel Patra Jasa. Dari jalan raya agak turun jauh ke bawah hingga ke pinggir danau, lokasinya boleh dikatakan agak tersembunyi dan susah diakses. Tetapi pemandangannya dan restorannya luar biasa cantik. Untuk makanan, rasanya cukup oke, dan harga juga tidak terlalu mahal. Jika teman-teman sedang main-main ke Prapat, bolehlah coba singgah ke Damasus Resto. Mantap deh.

name: Anna
review-text:
Maruba Restaurant and Maruba Inn is a true gem in TukTuk. We enjoyed delicious food at the restaurant, served by humble and kind staff who made us feel very welcome. The views from the property are absolutely beautiful â€” the perfect setting to relax and unwind.

We stayed at the inn and loved the cozy rooms, each with easy access to the lake. Waking up to the peaceful water and natural surroundings was a highlight of our trip.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for great food, warm hospitality, and a relaxing place to stay by the lake.

name: Loic Bauschert
review-text:
Tempat yang luar biasa di Tuktuk! Kami datang terlambat, dan kokinya menyalakan kembali barbekyunya khusus untuk kami... Barbekyu ikannya luar biasa dan ikan arsiknya juga lezat (ikan terbaik yang kami makan selama liburan di Sumatra).
Kami merekomendasikannya tanpa ragu!

name: lc L
review-text:
Lake Toba is the biggest volcano lake in the world. Within the lake, there is Samosir island which is around 90% of total size of Singapore (as of today).

Spent 2 days on Samosir Island. Had Ikan Arsik at this restaurant. The fish was very fresh and the cooking exotic. The lakeview is even nicer.

I keep recalling the day I sat beside the window and sipping my coffee after I left so many days.

name: Igosus
review-text:
One of the best fish dishes I've ever had in my life!
I ordered a traditional Batak dish â€“ ikan arsik, a freshwater fish slowly simmered in a rich, flavorful sauce full of Batak spices. The fish was incredibly juicy and tender â€“ it literally fell apart on the fork and melted in my mouth. It was served with long green beans and slices of local vegetables that soaked up the sauce beautifully.

The most surprising part was the tingling, slightly numbing sensation on my tongue while eating â€“ almost like something minty or cooling, but without a mint taste. I suspect it came from andaliman, the famous Batak "magic spice" â€“ similar to Sichuan pepper, but more citrusy and electric. Strange, but honestly a very enjoyable experience.

I also had a freshly squeezed pineapple juice â€“ cold and refreshing. For dessert, I tried a pancake filled with pineapple. The pancake itself was great, but the pineapple chunks inside had a slightly fermented taste. I assume this happened because they were fresh and then reheated â€“ just not to my personal liking, even though I normally love pineapple.

The staff were friendly and welcoming. I came late in the evening, so the place was peaceful, and the view over the bay was stunning â€“ really added to the atmosphere. The only downside was some small insects buzzing around â€“ it would help to have a repellent or citronella candle on the table.

Despite that, this was a truly memorable food experience. If you're anywhere near Lake Toba and want to try something authentic, flavorful, and local â€“ this is the place.

name: Markus Lobner
review-text:

name: Maxwell institute
review-text: Yes we highly recommend this place. We ordered the Bakwan, Bihun Goreng, Urab, Ayam Semur, Nasi, Ikan Teri Sambal, and Buncis Tomato. Our personal favourites included the Ayam Semur, Urab, Bihun and Ikan Teri. Overall, we really enjoyed the food. The food is cooked fresh. You can request if you prefer your food less spicy. Also, they do not overdo salt in their food, it's just the right amount. I will be surprised if you do not enjoy their cooking.

Service was friendly, but the food was simply not good.
The garlic bread were two slices of sandwich bread with some garlic. The bruschetta was also served on toast. The lime juice tasted bland. The other dishes were ok.

Also, one person did have some stomach issues later at night. Since we didnâ€™t have lunch that day it must have been from dinner.

Vegan and vegetarian options available.

name: goyourownway
review-text:
Tasty Batak food

N2Â°40.504' E98Â°51.481' Tucked between the Ambaroba hotel and Rodeo guesthouse on Jalal Lingkar Tuktuk in TukTuk, Maruba is definitely worth seeking out the talented owner's matchless Batak wedding food, like ikan arsik or sangsang, or go for the not so special occasion food like ikan naneura (raw fish marinated with candlestick, lime juice and spices, order 8 hours in advance) and napi napir.

In September 2023, we ordered ikan arsik, whole steamed tilapia lake fish stuffed with snake beans, batak onions and cooked with batak spices. It was hard work to remove all the bones, but the spiced lake fish tasted exquisite.

Maruba restaurant offers fresh batak dishes. Recommended.

name: vÃ¨sna kaya
review-text: try ikan asrik â€” traditional batak food for wedding. herbs are unique

name: Sonja GlÃ¼hwÃ¼rmchen
review-text: It was tasty but expensive and small portions

name: Puti Piranti

name: Chaeyeon Im
review-text:
Makanan enak, pelayanan bagus dan ramah, pemandangan danau toba indah.ğŸ
âš ï¸cash only payment (cannot pay using QRIS or Card)

GaÃ«lle & LoÃ¯c, orang Prancis di atas kapal

name: Luc Servajean
review-text: Pertama kali minum bir dan melihat menu, kami akhirnya memesan ikan yang diasinkan untuk dipesan 8 jam sebelumnya, kami tidak kecewa, campuran rempah-rempah yang lezat, staf yang sangat ramah, ROTI BUATAN SENDIRI!! Semuanya sangat enak dan harganya sangat terjangkau

review-text: Friendly owners and extensive menu! Would recommend

review-text: Makanannya mantap, lobsternya lobster kecil, makan sampai nambah2...view nya juga lumayan, tapi area view nya gak terlalu luas.

name: William Colins
review-text:
Nyoba di sini karena review salah satu tempat wajib coba di website kuliner. Parkiran susah, di pinggir jalanan sempit saja dan mengganggu kendaraan lewat.

Ambience Tempat ok. Dapet view Toba. ğŸ‘

Service makanan lama datang nya, ğŸ˜®â€ğŸ’¨walau saat itu cuma kami yang ada saat itu.
Dari peralatan masaknya sepertinya home cooking saja, not professional kitchen.

Pesan babi panggang khas Batak, kurang nendang taste nya, lemaknya keras, walau dagingnya lembut.

Pesan spaghetti lobster, aduh makk.. ğŸ˜…ğŸ¤kecil amat lobster nya..dan biasa spaghetti seafood gini masak model aglio e olio, tapi ini pakai saus tomat kurang cocok.

Pesan nasi goreng spesial, ğŸ‘Œini masih lumayan rasanya.

Pesan burger fish fillet dan burger chicken, taste ok standar saja.

Overall too Overpriced compared to the taste and quality. ğŸ’¸ğŸ’¸ğŸ’¸

name: Astriviani Switania
review-text: We ordered grilled fish, chicken napinadir, and lobster. Everything was delicious. The owner was friendly. Great place ğŸ‘ğŸ»

name: Hwayke Tio
review-text:
We wanted to eat Batak style instead of the common Indonesian food in the hotel. So we ended in this restaurant. We choose a fish and a chicken dish and were not disappointed.
Tasty an we enjoyed or dinner.
Restaurant has a view to the lake, which we enjoyed till it got dark.

name: Putri sani Siallagan
review-text: Makanan yang sangat enak dan pemandangan yang indah.

name: A Bit
review-text: I must admit that we were quite disappointed. I give the lady 3 stars only because she apologized, but nothing can hide the fact that the food was not tasty at all to say the least. We walked especially to this place based on previous reviews and recommendations, but we can not give one.

name: Patrycja Kurczyk
review-text:
Omg the food is so so amazing, really generous portion and spiced so well.
Youâ€™ll miss out if you donâ€™t try
Lots of yummy local options

review-text: Very nice food! Also amazing home made fries! We definitely enjoyed our meal here

name: Amber Nobel
review-text: It's a coazy an clean restaurant with very good view and kind staff. The food was very good and well prepared.

name: Salvatore Bognanni
review-text: Makanan yang sangat enak dan segar. Kami makan dengan sangat enak, baik makanan khas Indonesia maupun makanan lokal Batak. Di akhir makan siang kami berbagi durian kecil. Makanan penutup yang sempurna. Harga jujur â€‹â€‹dan orang-orang yang sangat ramah dan tulus. Hanya satu hal: mereka tidak memiliki POS jadi pastikan Anda punya uang tunai.

name: Angharad Rachel Hyde
review-text: Nadi nadir was delicious, customised level of heat, one of the best. Freshly cooked food with original local recipes

name: Edi Setiawan
review-text: The grilled fish is tasty, but the price a bit high, served time too long although nobody there

name: Traveling Man
review-text:
WOW! Im back after 3 years cuz Covid. Eating at Marubas this morning and as I said 3 years ago.... Best of the best. You won't be disappointed both selection and quality at a fair price. Ask for the breakfast special, not on the menu so secret special as seen in photo. Go for it!

WOW, just came back and had the Fish & ChipsğŸ‘. Muy Bueno, absolutely delicious. Sorry no picture as I ate half before I thought about it. Fish was a perfect beer batter with vinegar, lemon and tartar sauce on side. Chips were homemade and specially treated so they were crunchy and not soft and droopy. 5â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ rating on the Fish & Chips!

name: Lydia Kristiani
review-text: Pesen naniura, rasanya asam banget karena memang untuk bikin ikan matang. Pemandangannya bagus langsung menghadap Danau Toba. Perlu pre order dulu dan bisa menghubungi restorannya via whatsapp.

name: Dim Gl
review-text: The best place on Tuk Tuk, very tasty, nice view and super friendly hostess.  Fried fish mast try!

name: patbom
review-text: We had fantastic Batak-style lunch here. We ordered Napinadir chicken that has very similar seasoning style to Saksang. You can request it to be prepared without the chicken blood, as opposed to the original recipe. The chicken is still very tasty and perfectly matched with the ubi tumbuk side dish. The restaurant has lake view, certainly a bonus!

name: Anne-Sophie
review-text:
Very tasteful food! We ordered the pad thai and nasi goreng. Both dishes were delicious!
The staff is very friendly and helps you with a big smile.
Highly recommend this place!

name: Lucy Davis
review-text: Incredible, freshly cooked food with a beautiful view of Lake Toba. A family-run and friendly restaurant not to be missed during a visit to Samosir. The restaurant area was well-looked after with pretty plants. The menu was interesting and varied including Indonesian, Batak and Western food. Highly recommend the Ikan Naneura - requires ordering 8 hours in advance but so worth swinging by to order in the morning for a memorable evening meal!

name: ClÃ©mentine BoyÃ©
review-text: Restoran yang luar biasa, 10/10 untuk lokasi, sambutan, dan hidangannya. Semuanya enak, sandwichnya, hidangan ikannya, jus buahnya... Terima kasih banyak atas makanan enak ini dan mungkin sampai jumpa lagi!

name: L R
review-text: Good place and good food.. nice services.. perfect combination.. must visit.. ğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ â€¦

name: nur komariah
review-text: Freshly made pizza

name: Simone
review-text:
Rented scooter here. Excellent service. We got a short lesson as it was the first time. Very good price and handed the scooter back in with same amount of petrol as when we got it.

Also did laundry here and booked transport back to Medan. All very well organised and friendly family.

name: Ming Kern
review-text: Good food and reasonable price

name: Tae Yoon
review-text: Makanan yang lezat dan penampilan musik dari pemiliknya merupakan kombinasi yang hebat.

name: Anthony L.
review-text: Wonderful food. Wonderful service. Even more wonderful people. The whole family made us feel welcome and even invited us in back to see their puppies that were born three weeks ago! Felt like I was eating with family, not at a restaurant. The grilled pork and pizza adaliman were exceptional and heightened even further with house made sambal andaliman. Bagus sekali!

review-text: makanannya enakğŸ‘ğŸ», Rental kreta sesuai dengan harga,pelayanan bagus dan ramah,Suasana sejuk,dan indah, restaurant unik, sangat-sangat memuaskanğŸ˜ŠğŸ™ğŸ»

name: Marie BÃ©lorgey
review-text: Do not rent scooter here, they are scammers. They only accept to rent it "full" and you give it back empty in order to charge more but they do not do full. They only do just what is needed to have all bars and the first one vanish in less than 200m.

review-text: Banyak pilihan menu makanan di Alyssa restaurant tuktuk samosir. Ikannya fresh langsung diambil Dari kolam depan restonya. Babi panggang dan bumbu andaliman di sini juga enak. Service juga sangat ramah dan baik, tempatnya juga nyaman dengan meja Dan kursi kayu yang besar. Recommended restaurant in tuktuk samosir

name: Jonathan M.
review-text:
Delicious saksang (no blood), roasted pork, grilled fish and vegetables you must try. Ask Pak Alyssa to cook for you.
Kids can play with fish pond.

name: christelle Perisse

Jangan sampai terlewatkan

review-text: Itâ€™s with pleasure that I give 5 stars for this restaurant, with very kind and serviable people. You can also rent a motorbike, use wash-machine or ask for any questions. I recommend also the grilled food and for the breakfast the banana pancake (very big and tasty)

Daging babi bakarnya enak, dimakan dengan nasi panas juga enak.

Her sweet family, friendly, kind, relaxed atmosphere and some delicious Indonesian food.
Definitely going there again.
Suz

review-text: Makanan lezatğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š. Sangat direkomendasikan!

name: Palastri Shop
review-text:
Friendly staffs, good food ğŸ²
Cuman, ada hewan kucing ğŸ±ğŸ˜½ğŸ˜ºdan anjing ğŸ•di restaurant tersebut. Jika ga nyaman, bisa info. Karena kucing mendekati kami terus saat mau makan. Hehehe :) cute :)

name: A A
review-text: Good food. BBQ Babi Panggang. And for vegetarian I recommend the tomatosoup.

review-text:
Nice restaurant. Babi Panggang made on bbq in the restaurant. Served with home made sauce. Guitar playing owner with good voice.
We had a special evening.

name: Nora Ezla
review-text: Makanannya sangat, sangat enak. Kami memiliki Babi Panggang (daging babi, dipanggang dan dicincang), Saksang (daging babi dengan saus lada yang sedikit membuat lidah mati rasa) dan Ikan Teri (ikan kering kecil dengan saus tomat). Semuanya berkualitas tinggi, segar dan sangat berpengalaman.

name: David Doelman
review-text: We came here to eat food at 7pm on a Friday and after a lot of local food we wanted to try pizza. After ordering a beer we were told the pizza was out. Also the fish&chips and the sweet and sour fish were out. It appears they only had a few local spicy options. How can you call yourself a pizza place if it does not serve pizza. It also did not help the cats were begging for food on the table we were eating from. We finished our beer and left for a different place. I would avoid this place.

name: elena
review-text: Kami makan di Tul Tuk selama dua malam (mereka akan menyiapkan panggangan untuk Anda saat Anda tiba). Hidangannya sangat lezat dan berlimpah: babi panggang yang lezat (babi pangang), babi sansang (kari babi, meskipun bukan kari India atau Thailand, karena merupakan hidangan khas lokal yang sangat lezat), gado-gado (dengan telur rebus yang spektakuler), dan kari sayur (yang satu ini dari India) adalah hidangan yang kami coba, dan kami mencobanya beberapa kali selama kedua kunjungan. Musik lokal yang dimainkan oleh pemilik restoran dengan gitar melengkapi pengalaman bersantap. Anda dapat membayar dengan kartu (dengan biaya tambahan 2%, tetapi itu akan membantu Anda terhindar dari masalah).

name: jose daniel mosquera
review-text: Baby (grilled pork), pork sangsan (curry), Gado gado with vegetables. All dishes supertasty and in big portions. Good price-quality. The guy sings and plays lovely batak songs

name: Ellis Nanninga
review-text: I got food poisoning here..
